TopicTitle: The resulting periapsis and apoapsis of a maneuver node are not visible while adjusting it.

Articles.Content:
In KSP 1 you can pin the periapsis and apoapsis of the resulting orbit of a maneuver node.  You can not do this in KSP 2 and so you can't do it accurately. 
While you can hover over the nodes and get the altitude while the node is not in edit mode, you can not do this in edit mode.

I noticed this too.

And while editing nodes you also can't see the resulting ap/pe when hovering over them with the mouse.
You have to quit editing and then you'll see the resulting ap/pe.
